The Country Tax Rule Exception Line for [line] must be unique.
Either Tax Items Group or Tax Item must be empty.
You may not specify both Spend and Revenue categories.  At least one of the two must be empty.
Cannot have both a Customer Tax Status and a Supplier Tax Status.
